Built to meet the needs of the modern battlefield, the ACE-52 is a convenient choice for armies and agents seeking an advanced rifle. Heralded as the ultimate assault weapon, it has been battle-proven under the most adverse and extreme conditions. Although based upon the IMI Galils of old, advanced design and performance mechanisms have transformed the ACE-52 into a more reliable and highly accurate weapon for combat warfare.
